---
# Source: chart-with-ingress-with-map-host/templates/ingress.yaml
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: chart-with-ingress-with-map-host
spec:
  ingressClassName: myclassname
  rules:
    - host: "myhost1.local"
      http:
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: mypathtype1
            backend:
              service:
                name: mypath1
                port:
                  number: 9898
    - host: "changed_host.com"
      http:
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: mypathtype2
            backend:
              service:
                name: mypath2
                port:
                  number: 9898
    - host: "myhost3.local"
      http:
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: mypathtype3
            backend:
              service:
                name: mypath3
                port:
                  number: 9898
